datasetContactAffiliation.value: Harvard Business School, Knowledge and Library Services

dsDescriptionValue.value: Company hierarchies, executives, boards, and brands of public and private companies in the US and some international public companies back to 1993. Available as a bulk set of data files.

value: The library subscribes to an alternate searchable database format of Corporate Affiliations (Historical Edition)

files.description: Zip file containing CSV data files organized in folders by year.  Each folder typically includes four files organized by type of company: dca_pub (public), dca_prv (private), dca_int (international) and dca_null (unclassified)
files.label: CorporateAffiliationsData1993-2017.zip

dataFile.description: Zip file containing CSV data files organized in folders by year.  Each folder typically includes four files organized by type of company: dca_pub (public), dca_prv (private), dca_int (international) and dca_null (unclassified)

files.description: INPUT and INFORMAT statements to be utilized with SAS program file
files.label: Input_20180629.txt

dataFile.description: INPUT and INFORMAT statements to be utilized with SAS program file

files.description: SAS program that reads the data files in CSV format and creates temporary SAS datasets; to run, it uses INPUT and INFORMAT statements contained in the file Input_20180629.txt
